statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 24 \\ 32 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -32 \\ -40 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -14 \\ 44 \\ 52 \\ 10 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
